author: Simon Difford
description: If you're the kind to opt for a splash of flavoured syrup at the coffee shop, then this variation on Dick Bradsell's original Espresso Martini is for you. And with the range of flavoured vodkas and sugar syrups available, why stop at vanilla?
name: Vanilla Espresso Martini
recipeIngredient: 2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
